provisions.text: Hold paramount the safety, health, and welfare of the public
provisions.relevance: Omitted safety features in AI-generated designs could compromise public welfare
provisions.application_to_case: Engineer A's insufficient review of design documents risked public safety

provisions.text: Perform services only in areas of their competence
provisions.relevance: Engineer A was competent in environmental engineering but inexperienced with AI tools
provisions.application_to_case: Technical competence established; tool competence questionable

provisions.relevance: Question of whether non-disclosure of AI use constitutes deception
provisions.application_to_case: BER found no deception where AI-generated content was accurate and verified

provisions.text: Confidential information can only be shared with prior consent of the Client
provisions.relevance: Uploading client data to open-source AI may expose confidential information
provisions.application_to_case: Engineer A did not obtain client consent before using AI with client data

provisions.text: Undertake assignments only when qualified by education or experience in the specific technical fields involved
provisions.relevance: Establishes competency requirements for engineering work
provisions.application_to_case: Engineer A qualified in environmental engineering domain

provisions.text: Engineers shall not affix their signatures to any plans or documents not prepared under their direction and control
provisions.relevance: Core question of whether AI-generated content was under Engineer A's direction and control
provisions.application_to_case: Report satisfied requirement through thorough review; designs did not

provisions.text: Comply with state and federal laws and regulations
provisions.relevance: Licensure law requires responsible charge over sealed documents
provisions.application_to_case: Engineer A violated licensure law by not maintaining responsible charge over designs

provisions.text: Give credit for engineering work to those to whom credit is due
provisions.relevance: Question of whether AI contributions require attribution
provisions.application_to_case: Engineer A did not provide required technical citations
